title: CONTAINERYARD / RICH GUY CONTAINER DOOR
description: Here be the container door with which you converse good Sir, getting rhetorical awards you the ability to *drum-roll* enter the container!

dialogueTree.title: Cargo Container Door: "The door seems to be locked. Conclu..."
dialogueTree.text: The door seems to be locked. Conclusively.

dialogueTree.title: Cargo Container Door: "You're back before the cargo contai..."
dialogueTree.text: You're back before the cargo container. Its draw has not lessened since you were last here. If anything, it seems to have grown slightly.

links.title: You: "Knock on the door."
links.text: Knock on the door.

links.title: Cargo Container Door: "No reply."
links.text: No reply.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "The knock produces a hollow ring of..."
links.text: The knock produces a hollow ring of metal. Doesn't sound like there's anything inside the container.

links.title: You: "Open the door."
links.text: Open the door.

links.title: Cargo Container Door: "You attempt to turn the handle, to..."
links.text: You attempt to turn the handle, to no avail. The doors seem to be mechanically locked.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "To your left, the lieutenant consid..."
links.text: To your left, the lieutenant considers your actions -- with some puzzlement.

links.title: You: "Persuade the door to open."
links.text: Persuade the door to open.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Step aside, rank and file, Savvy's..."
links.text: Step aside, rank and file, Savvy's at the top of the VIP list here. That's right -- out of the way!

links.title: Rhetoric: "Whoa! Watch it!"
links.text: Whoa! Watch it!

links.title: Physical Instrument: "How'd he get in front? Little slime..."
links.text: How'd he get in front? Little slimeball...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Thank you, thank you. Now, are you..."
links.text: Thank you, thank you. Now, are you ready? It's time to *make our entrance*.

links.title: You: ""Khm-khm..." (Clear your throat, kn..."
links.text: "Khm-khm..." (Clear your throat, knock on the door.) "Hi, it's Savvy here, Savvy with two v's, I'm on the list. The guest list."

links.title: Cargo Container Door: "At first your knock rings hollow on..."
links.text: At first your knock rings hollow on the door -- and then...

links.title: Cargo Container Door: "Just like that, you hear a click. T..."
links.text: Just like that, you hear a click. Then a rattle. Some mechanism unlocks itself inside the door.

links.title: Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy: "From deep within the container, a v..."
links.text: From deep within the container, a voice: "Ahoy! Come on in!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The smile disappears. "You can't be..."
links.text: The smile disappears. "You can't be serious."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Despite the dirt that surrounds and..."
links.text: Despite the dirt that surrounds and trails you, a beacon of light emerges from deep within you.

links.title: You: ""Hello, is there anybody in there?""
links.text: "Hello, is there anybody in there?"

links.title: Cargo Container Door: "The door stands silent."
links.text: The door stands silent.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Satisfied, detective?" A wry smile..."
links.text: "Satisfied, detective?" A wry smile crosses the lieutenant's face.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Try again."
links.text: Try again.

links.title: You: ""If there's someone in there, I'd l..."
links.text: "If there's someone in there, I'd like to talk to you."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Aaaaand as it's always been -- it's..."
links.text: Aaaaand as it's always been -- it's impossible to open a container with rhetoric. Maybe you're losing your mind?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Seems like it. You're still hanging..."
links.text: Seems like it. You're still hanging with this fool? Something isn't right...

links.title: Rhetoric: "Why are you even trying to open a d..."
links.text: Why are you even trying to open a door with rhetoric?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "That's a very good question conside..."
links.text: That's a very good question considering you have Savvy around -- the ultimate VIP.

links.title: You: ""Because getting physical wasn't an..."
links.text: "Because getting physical wasn't an option!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Because what wasn't an option?" Th..."
links.text: "Because what wasn't an option?" The lieutenant looks startled.

links.title: You: ""Using my body over my wits.""
links.text: "Using my body over my wits."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now is not the time to get philoso..."
links.text: "Now is not the time to get philosophical, detective. You can do that after hours."

links.title: You: ""Never mind.""
links.text: "Never mind."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods. "Are you satis..."
links.text: The lieutenant nods. "Are you satisfied, detective?"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Have I been summoned?"
links.text: Have I been summoned?

links.title: Rhetoric: "No one needs you. Go away."
links.text: No one needs you. Go away.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You've got to dance with the one th..."
links.text: You've got to dance with the one that brought you, detective.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, why *am* I?""
links.text: "Yeah, why *am* I?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why are you what?" The lieutenant..."
links.text: "Why are you what?" The lieutenant looks startled.

links.title: You: ""Anything at all.""
links.text: "Anything at all."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Who understands anything you do?"
links.text: Who understands anything you do?

links.title: You: "Nothing more to do here for now. [L..."
links.text: Nothing more to do here for now. [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""Hey there, sugar.""
links.text: "Hey there, sugar."

links.title: Cargo Container Door: "The container door appears unmoved..."
links.text: The container door appears unmoved by your attempt at flattery.

links.title: Suggestion: "A tough nut to crack, for sure. But..."
links.text: A tough nut to crack, for sure. But the strongest containers often have the softest hearts.

links.title: You: ""You're a fine piece of engineering..."
links.text: "You're a fine piece of engineering, do you know that?"

links.title: Cargo Container Door: "The door does not respond to your a..."
links.text: The door does not respond to your advances. Is it possible that it seems somehow *more* closed than before?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Why does this situation feel so fam..."
links.text: Why does this situation feel so familiar? Do you have a history of propositioning inanimate objects?

links.title: You: ""C'mon, don't shut me out. Let me i..."
links.text: "C'mon, don't shut me out. Let me in."

links.title: Cargo Container Door: "The door does not respond to your a..."
links.text: The door does not respond to your advances. Is it possible that it seems somehow *more* closed than before?

links.title: You: ""It's just another day, another cop..."
links.text: "It's just another day, another cop and another container."

links.title: Cargo Container Door: "The mundaneness of the situation do..."
links.text: The mundaneness of the situation does not seem to affect the container in the slightest.

links.title: You: "[Leave the container alone.]"
links.text: [Leave the container alone.]

dialogueTree.title: Cargo Container Door: "Before you stands a cargo container..."
dialogueTree.text: Before you stands a cargo container. Just one of many in the yard.

links.title: You: ""Lieutenant, I think there's someth..."
links.text: "Lieutenant, I think there's something *special* about this container..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs. "Is this like..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs. "Is this like your thing with that wall again?"

links.title: You: ""No, it's totally different. I don'..."
links.text: "No, it's totally different. I don't want to paint it. I'm just *drawn* to it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There are a million containers her..."
links.text: "There are a million containers here. Why are you fixating on this one?"

links.title: You: ""Mark my words -- there's someone r..."
links.text: "Mark my words -- there's someone rich buzzing away inside!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't hear anything." The lieute..."
links.text: "I don't hear anything." The lieutenant cups one of his ears.

links.title: You: ""That's because you're not *tuned i..."
links.text: "That's because you're not *tuned in*. Perks of being a hustler. You'll see -- I'll be rolling in money soon."

links.title: You: ""It was hanging from the crane.""
links.text: "It was hanging from the crane."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You just picked one out, because y..."
links.text: "You just picked one out, because you wanted to interact with a cargo container."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're not here to interact with co..."
links.text: "We're not here to interact with containers -- we're here to get the body down from the tree."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're not here to interact with co..."
links.text: "We're not here to interact with containers -- we're here to interview the Union boss."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're not here to interact with co..."
links.text: "We're not here to interact with containers -- we're here to talk to the Union, right?"

links.title: You: ""I don't know, Kim, it just *feels*..."
links.text: "I don't know, Kim, it just *feels* special."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's a cargo container, detective...."
links.text: "It's a cargo container, detective. Just like all the others." He doesn't even look at it.

links.title: You: "(Inspect the container.) "Maybe the..."
links.text: (Inspect the container.) "Maybe there's contraband in there?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant considers this for a..."
links.text: The lieutenant considers this for a moment. "There may very well be, but we're not here to look for that."

links.title: You: ""You're right, it's probably nothin..."
links.text: "You're right, it's probably nothing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Damn it, now you've got *me* curio..."
links.text: "Damn it, now you've got *me* curious... this is *not* what we came to the harbour for."

links.title: You: ""Maybe? I can't tell. I think we sh..."
links.text: "Maybe? I can't tell. I think we should investigate further."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You do? Because I don't.""
links.text: "You do? Because I don't."

links.title: You: ""What, why not?""
links.text: "What, why not?"
